name: Monkey Slap
description: Go on a long adventure with gay monkeys. Tropical islands, hot deserts, frozen plains. Fight with evil primates. Collect coins and equip your character with different weapons, clothes, skill enhancements. Each new level is more complicated than the previous one. Funny game for brave boys and girls.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: DualCore Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128mb Storage: 240 MB available space
